addon.name: BilliBuys

queries.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:bb_ratings` ( `bb_rating_id` MEDIUMINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` MEDIUMINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `rating_text` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, `rating_score` DECIMAL(1,1) NOT NULL, `status` VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, `rating_type` VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, `rating_type_id` INT NOT NULL, `timestamp` MEDIUMINT(11) NOT NULL, `ip_address` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bb_rating_id`) ) COMMENT='Ratings database' COLLATE='latin1_swedish_ci' ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:bb_notifications` ( `bb_notify_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `notify_string` VARCHAR(255), `user_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `ip_address` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bb_notify_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:bb_requests` ( `bb_request_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `request_item_id` int(11) unsigned, `ip_address` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `expiry_date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `allow_over_max_price` tinyint(1) ZEROFILL unsigned NOT NULL, `item_added_to_cart` tinyint(1) ZEROFILL unsigned NOT NULL, `request_category_id` int(11) unsigned, PRIMARY KEY (`bb_request_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:bb_request_archive` ( `bb_request_archive_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `bb_request_id` int(11), `user_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `request_id` int(11), `ip_address` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `expiry_date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `allow_over_max_price` tinyint(1) ZEROFILL unsigned NOT NULL, `request_category_id` int(11) unsigned, PRIMARY KEY (`bb_request_archive_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:bb_request_categories` ( `bb_request_category_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `parent_category_id` int(11) unsigned ZEROFILL, `id_path` varchar(255), `position` smallint(5) unsigned ZEROFILL, `status` char(1) DEFAULT "A", PRIMARY KEY (`bb_request_category_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:bb_request_category_descriptions` ( `bb_request_category_id` int(11) unsigned ZEROFILL NOT NULL, `lang_code` VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'EN', `category_name` VARCHAR(50), `description` VARCHAR(500), PRIMARY KEY (`bb_request_category_id`,`lang_code`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:bb_request_item` ( `bb_request_item_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` VARCHAR(50), `description` VARCHAR(500), `max_price` DECIMAL(10,2), `over_max_price` tinyint(1) ZEROFILL unsigned NOT NULL, `quantity` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bb_request_item_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:bb_request_item_archive` ( `bb_request_item_archive_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `bb_request_item_id` int(11), `title` VARCHAR(50), `description` VARCHAR(500), `max_price` DECIMAL(10,2), `over_max_price` tinyint(2) ZEROFILL unsigned NOT NULL, `quantity` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bb_request_item_archive_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:bb_bids` ( `bb_bid_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `request_id` int(11), `product_id` int(11), `price` DECIMAL(10,2), `quantity` INT(11), `user_id` INT(11), `active` TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `timestamp` INT(15) UNSIGNED, `ip` VARCHAR(50), PRIMARY KEY (`bb_bid_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:bb_bids_archive` ( `bb_bid_archive_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `bb_bid_id` int(11), `request_id` int(11), `product_id` int(11), `price` DECIMAL(10,2), `quantity` INT(11), `user_id` INT(11), `active` TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `timestamp` INT(15) UNSIGNED, `ip` VARCHAR(50), PRIMARY KEY (`bb_bid_archive_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;
